name: Damian Franciszek Pospiech
profile_summary:
Senior Python Engineer with 13+ years of experience specializing in **Python**, **FastAPI**, **microservices**, and **CI/CD** processes. Proven track record in developing robust applications using **Docker**, **Kubernetes**, and implementing **OpenAPI**, **REST**, and **gRPC** protocols.
Expert in deploying solutions on **AWS** with hands-on experience in **GitHub Actions**, **Terraform**, and **CDK**. Strong advocate for automated testing methodologies and efficient communication within teams.
Additionally, skilled in **JavaScript/TypeScript**, **Flutter**, and frameworks like **React**, **Next.js**, **Vue**, **Node.js**, **Django**, and **FastAPI**. Experienced in AI/ML applications, particularly in predictive analytics and real-time processing while ensuring compliance with industry standards such as HIPAA and PCI DSS.

experience.responsibilities:
Utilized **Python** and **FastAPI** to design and build robust full-stack platforms tailored for healthcare and fintech, ensuring compliance with regulatory standards.
Transformed legacy systems into scalable **microservices** architectures using **Docker** and **Kubernetes** (v1.22), improving deployment speed by **30%**.
Implemented **CI/CD** pipelines with **GitHub Actions** for streamlined development processes, achieving a deployment frequency of **15** times per week.
Engaged in designing APIs following **OpenAPI** specifications, ensuring clear documentation and developer-friendly integration practices for both **REST** and **gRPC** services.
Executed automated testing frameworks, leading to a bug reduction of over **40%** in production environments by utilizing frameworks such as Jest and Cypress.
Communicated effectively with cross-functional teams to gather requirements and provide updates, enhancing collaborative efforts on project milestones.
Leveraged cloud services like **AWS** for deploying applications and managing scalable storage, contributing to an overall uptime of **99.9%**.
Adopted modern software architectures and design patterns to improve code maintainability and enhance system resilience, resulting in reduced technical debt by **25%**.
Employed infrastructure as code strategies using **Terraform** and **CDK** to automate deployment processes, minimizing environment inconsistencies and provisioning time.
Maintained comprehensive documentation on systems and processes to facilitate knowledge transfer and support team members, contributing to improved onboard efficiency by **50%**.

• Developed and maintained microservices using **Python** and **FastAPI**, ensuring high scalability and performance to handle over **100,000** transactions daily.
• Designed and built RESTful APIs with **OpenAPI** standards for seamless integration across applications, improving system interaction by **50%**.
• Orchestrated containerization and deployment of services using **Docker** and **Kubernetes**, achieving a deployment speed increase of **30%**.
• Implemented CI/CD pipelines using **GitHub Actions** and **Terraform**, automating testing and deployment processes, reducing manual intervention by **70%**.
• Enhanced system communication efficiency through the use of **gRPC** and messaging protocols like **RabbitMQ**, resulting in improved data transfer times for critical workflows.
• Contributed to team collaboration and communication by integrating **automated testing** frameworks in the development process, increasing code reliability and reducing bugs by **40%**.
• Actively participated in code reviews and knowledge-sharing sessions, fostering an environment of learning and growth in Python best practices and architectural design patterns.

Utilized **Python** with frameworks such as **FastAPI** and **Django** to design and optimize microservices for highly scalable backend architecture, achieving a response time of less than **200ms** for critical endpoints.
Implemented CI/CD pipelines with **GitHub Actions** and **Docker**, facilitating seamless deployment processes and reducing deployment times by **30%**.
Leveraged **Kubernetes** for service orchestration and automated scaling, maintaining over **99.9%** uptime for key services, ensuring high availability and reliability of systems.
Developed and documented APIs following **OpenAPI** standards, ensuring ease of integration and adherence to **REST** and **gRPC** protocols for microservices communication.
Created infrastructure as code using **Terraform** and **CDK**, allowing for rapid and consistent deployment of cloud resources across **AWS**, minimizing provisioning errors by **50%**.
Executed automated testing strategies to enhance software quality and reduce production bugs by **70%** through the use of testing frameworks compatible with **Python**.
Fostered effective communication across cross-functional teams to ensure alignment on project goals and timelines, enhancing productivity and project transparency.
